Title: Dead Grid
Writer: Jamie Farnsworth (story), Seth Marrotte, Matthew Oliver
Actors: Jamie Farnsworth, Jeremy Farnsworth, Spencer Dixon, Brian Jarvis
Plot: Infinity Cyber Arms created a computer virus that caused a major EMP and killed 90% of the population of New England. Vincent, John, and Tom must stop this company from destroying the world. Only one person can stop them.
